mapper.sql: id,user_id as userId,url,request_method as requestMethod,request_parameter as requestParameter,request_ip_address as requestIpAddress,request_time as requestTime,remark
mapper.select:
select count(1) from operation_log ol where 1=1
and ol.user_id in(select u.user_id from user u where u.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%'))
and ol.request_ip_address like CONCAT('%',#{requestIpAddress},'%')
